name: Coconut Banana Pancake
description: Indulge in the goodness of Coconut Banana Pancakes, a healthified delight that's perfect for those seeking high-fiber, nutritious meal options. Crafted with the wholesomeness of Saba bananas, coconut flour, and extra virgin coconut oil, these pancakes promise a heart-healthy start to your day

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the Saba Banana until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix together the mashed banana, coconut flour, eggs, baking powder, and salt until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add a tablespoon of extra virgin coconut oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour a scoop of the pancake batter into the skillet, cook for about 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat the process with the remaining batter, adding more coconut oil to the skillet as needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
